<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d356fc65d273959efa9b05bfa0f07ce1c9ff85a4|patch 8.2.2123: after using a complete popup the buffer is listed>
patch 8.2.2123: after using a complete popup the buffer is listed

Problem:    After using a complete popup the buffer is listed. (Boris
            Staletic)
Solution:   Make the buffer unlisted.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2123: after using a complete popup the buffer is listed · vim/vim@d356fc6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2123: after using a complete popup the buffer is listed · vim/vim@d356fc6
attachments.text: Problem: After using a complete popup the buffer is listed. (Boris Staletic) Solution: Make the buffer unlisted.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9ec7026f24e9ac51654300e32afd2b7540cab5f8|patch 8.2.2122: Vim9: crash when sourcing vim9script early>
patch 8.2.2122: Vim9: crash when sourcing vim9script early

Problem:    Vim9: crash when sourcing vim9script early.
Solution:   Use set_option_value() instead of setting p_cpo directly.
            (closes #7441)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2122: Vim9: crash when sourcing vim9script early · vim/vim@9ec7026
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2122: Vim9: crash when sourcing vim9script early · vim/vim@9ec7026
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when sourcing vim9script early. Solution: Use set_option_value() instead of setting p_cpo directly. (closes #7441)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a7a691cc142439e266f4ceb1f208bb952b57aa71|patch 8.2.2121: internal error when using \ze before \zs in a pattern>
patch 8.2.2121: internal error when using \ze before \zs in a pattern

Problem:    Internal error when using \ze before \zs in a pattern.
Solution:   Check the end is never before the start. (closes #7442)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2121: internal error when using \ze before \zs in a pattern · vim/vim@a7a691c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2121: internal error when using \ze before \zs in a pattern · vim/vim@a7a691c
attachments.text: Problem: Internal error when using \ze before \zs in a pattern. Solution: Check the end is never before the start. (closes #7442)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7988a6f0e9999d1103271024ab4ed26e5599de17|patch 8.2.2119: GTK3: status line background color is wrong>
patch 8.2.2119: GTK3: status line background color is wrong

Problem:    GTK3: status line background color is wrong.
Solution:   Don't change the code for earlier GTK3 versions. (closes #7444)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2119: GTK3: status line background color is wrong · vim/vim@7988a6f

attachments.text: Problem: GTK3: status line background color is wrong. Solution: Don't change the code for earlier GTK3 versions. (closes #7444)
